title: Merlin and the War of the Dragons (2008)
description:
Merlin and the War of the Dragons is a 2008 fantasy film produced by The Asylum, based loosely on the legends of King Arthur. It was filmed entirely on location in Wales

In Pre-England Britain, sometime before the birth of King Arthur, Merlin (Simon Lloyd Roberts) is already active and now serves under King Vortigern (Hefin Wyn).

Soon after Vortigern's coronation, a large army of giant, fire-breathing dragons lands in Britain and begins to terrorize the land, setting fire to buildings and feasting on any who are unable to escape. Due to their size and number, the dragons threaten the very existence of Britain itself, and Vortigern instructs Merlin to lead an army against the dragons, ordering his best generalsÃ¢â‚¬â€Hengist (Iago McGuire) and Uther (Dylan Jones)Ã¢â‚¬â€to aid Merlin in any way possible.

With the help of Vortigern and his generals, Merlin begins to think of ways to defeat the dragons, who are growing stronger every day whilst Britain grows weaker. Using magic and knowledge, Merlin devises a plan that will ultimately decide the fate of British history.

Nia Ann - Lady Nimue
Ceri Bostock - Gwyneth
Carys Eleri - Lady Vivianne
Ruthie Gwilym - Midwife
William Huw - Torm
Dylan Jones - Uther
Iago McGuire - Hengist
JÃƒÂ¼rgen Prochnow - The Mage

Directed by Mark Atkins
Produced by David Michael Latt, David Rimawi and Paul Bales
Written by Jon Macy
Starring: Nia Ann, Ceri Bostock,Carys Eleri and Ruthie Gwilym
Cinematography: Mark Atkins
Distributed by The Asylum
Release date(s): November 25, 2008
Running time: 90 minutes
Country: United Kingdom and United States
Language:	English-language
Budget: $65.00
